footer.title: Zhang Xiaoming's Personal Homepage
footer.description: Thank you for visiting my personal homepage. I look forward to working with you to create excellent web applications!

home.intro: I am a frontend developer, passionate about technology and pursuing excellence
home.description: Love learning, love life, create higher quality work results.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a passionate frontend engineer with 5 years of professional experience, specializing in building high-performance, responsive web applications using modern frontend technologies. I focus on user experience, pursue code quality, and enjoy continuously learning new technologies.

skills.title: Professional Skills
skills.description: I have mastered various frontend and backend technologies, and can independently complete the full development process from design to implementation.

frontend.title: Frontend Development
frontend.description: Proficient in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Vue and other frontend technologies, able to build responsive and high-performance web applications.

backend.title: Backend Development
backend.description: Familiar with Node.js, Express, MongoDB and other backend technologies, able to develop RESTful APIs and full-stack applications.

uiux.title: UI/UX Design
uiux.description: With good design sense and user experience awareness, able to create beautiful and easy-to-use interface designs.

pdfModal.title: Contact Information
pdfModal.tokenLabel: Enter token to get contact information

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved. Please check the URL.
